name: Haunted Jack
description:
You're a haunted scarecrow that guards a pumpkin garden. It's Halloween and filthy humans come to steal you precious pumpkins.

Protect your garden by haunting them until they run away in fear.

---

This is my very first game. I've learned so much in the past week, and I'm really grateful to everyone that helped me made this little project. I hope you like it.
